page.title: 15Employment in Wroxall.
page.content: We have made a survey of 76 children asking where our mums and dads work.We did not ask the un-employed. There are 36 people work in Wroxall and 42 out of Wroxall.19 people work in factories,6 people on farms,9 people in shops,7 in pubs and 15 in tourism.There are 8 people work in schools and there are 14 people work in the building industry. There are other jobs that people do. 1 person works for the gas board.1 is a fireman,1 works at a riding stables and 1 works as a cleaning woman.There are 3 people who work at an old lady's home,1 works for the County Council and 1 on a submarine.1 person is a dustman,1 a bus-driver,1 a t.v.delivery-man .1 person works in a hospital,another in a doctor's surgery,1 is a vicar, 1 a housewife and 2 people are gardeners.
